General.Name: Sassy Resources Corporation
General.Description: Sassy Gold Corp., an exploration stage company, identifies, acquires, and explores for precious metal resources in Canada. It explores for gold and silver deposits. The company's flagship property is the Foremore property that consists of 35 mineral claims covering an area of 14,585 hectares located in the Eskay Creek District of British Columbia. It also has an option to acquire 100% interest in the Gander South, the Little River, the Hermitage, the Gander North, the Carmanville, the Cape Ray, the Mount Peyton, and the BLT properties located in Newfoundland. The company was formerly known as Sassy Resources Corporation and changed its name to Sassy Gold Corp. in July 2022. Sassy Gold Corp. was incorporated in 2019 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1681 Chestnut Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6J 4M6
